body:
Version: 1.0
      RestoreWorkspace: Default
      SaveWorkspace: Default
      AlwaysSaveHistory: Default
      
      EnableCodeIndexing: Yes
      UseSpacesForTab: Yes
      NumSpacesForTab: 2
      Encoding: UTF-8
      
      RnwWeave: Sweave
      LaTeX: XeLaTeX

linters: linters_with_defaults(
                    line_length_linter(120),
                    commented_code_linter = NULL,
                    assignment_linter = NULL,
                    trailing_whitespace_linter = NULL,
                    object_name_linter = NULL
                )
      exclusions: list()
#+ , results = 'asis', echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, eval =TRUE, fig.width = 10, fig.height = 10, unit = 'cm', comments = ''

#' ---
      #' title: '${1:Resultados temporales}'
      #' author: 'Fernando Andres-Pretel'
      #' output:
      #'    html_document:
      #'         toc: yes
      #'         toc_depth: 4
      #'         number_sections: true
      #'         toc_float:
      #'            collapsed: true
      #' ---
      #+ , echo=FALSE, include=FALSE
      rm(list = ls(all.names = TRUE))
      DATOS <- NULL
      load('DATOS_R/DATOS.RData')


      #' # Titulo 1
      #'
      #+ , results = 'asis', error = TRUE,  eval =TRUE, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, fig.width = 5, fig.height = 5, unit = 'cm', comment = ''
      ${2:CODIGO}
cabecera_html.description: cabecera para archivos HTML en R
